pull.title: Update to Romanian translation
pull.body: Romanian translation with the new wallet encrypt options included

events.body: Please update your commit to _only_ include the *.po file.  The binary *.mo file should not be included.
sorry, didn't know that it was created by poedit automatically

By "update commit" we mean to rebase your commit so that there is (a) only one commit, and (b) that commit updates *.po file.

We would prefer to -not- merge Commit A and Commit B, where Commit B simply fixes Commit A.  We would rather just have an updated Commit A.
ah ok, I think i got it
